definition: Libra (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
day/sky/heaven
steelyard/Roman balance/CL:臺|台[tai2]
variant of 稱|称[cheng1], to weigh
seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: The sign is ruled by Venus.
sentences.chinese: 天秤座的守護星是金星。

sentences.english: Libra was re-defined by the Romans as a separate constellation of the Zodiac.
sentences.chinese: 天秤座被羅馬人重新定義爲黃道十二宮中單獨的一宮。

sentences.english: The symbol of Libra is the scales of a balance.
sentences.chinese: 天秤座的標誌是一架平衡的天平。
摩羯座給予天秤座以情感支持。

sentences.english: Libra is an air sign, like Gemini and Aquarius.
sentences.chinese: 天秤座和雙子，水瓶一樣，是一個風象星座。

sentences.english: It will be an auspicious day for Libra men.
sentences.chinese: 天秤座男人的黃道吉日。

sentences.english: Libra is very sociable and likes being a part of a group.
sentences.chinese: 天秤座善於交際，喜歡融合於集體之中。

sentences.english: Hi! I am Teacher Lovely and my star sign is Libra.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，我是樂蒂老師，天秤座女生。

sentences.english: This could be one of the reasons Librans make good lawyers and judges.
sentences.chinese: 這也是爲什麼天秤座適合做律師和法官的原因。

sentences.english: Aquarius is an air sign, like Gemini and Libra.
sentences.chinese: 水瓶座和雙子座，天秤座一樣都是風象形作。

sentences.english: Libra will reach a decision sometime next year.
sentences.chinese: 天秤座會決定明年再送禮物。

sentences.english: Libra represents the Air element. It is a sign that is extroverted and active.
sentences.chinese: 天秤座是風相星座，其特性是比較外向和主動。

sentences.english: Stay-at-home Virgo resents Libra's socialbutterfly instincts and pursuit of pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 愛宅的處女座憎惡天秤座天性愛拈花惹草，追求快樂。

sentences.english: Libras are compassionate and loving people.
sentences.chinese: 天秤座的人們富有同情心，很有愛。

sentences.english: You, on the other hand, lack the sophistication required to keep a Libran happy.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，你也缺少讓天秤座的對象一直開心的經驗。

definition: Pisces (constellation and sign of the zodiac)

Capricornus
Leo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Taurus (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Aries (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
balance scale/Taiwan pr. [tian1 ping2]
constellation/astrological sign/CL:張|张[zhang1]
Capricorn (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Capricorn (star sign)/northern people in classical times, a branch of the Huns or Xiongnu 匈奴
